main.name: Mina Naeem
main.bio:
I am a software engineer who loves building web applications. I enjoy learning new technologies and concepts and improving my skills every day it's my passion.

During the past years, I tried multiple different fields trying Andriod development, Data science, machine learning, and Game development before I finally settled on Software engineering and Web development during my search I improved my skills in problem-solving a lot because all these experiences made me able to adapt easily to new changes and learn quickly and I really enjoyed the journey.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: here are some of my skills

work.title: Web developer
description: translated Figma designs to react.js projects
designed the ER and Relational models database for large systems and implemented them with Django
Design and implement a small and large backend system with Django

work.title: Android Developer,
description: converted an Android UI design into layout XML
Worked on a simple chat application with Java using firebase

work.title: Web Developer Volunteer,
description: integrated an existing website and admin dashboard with Laravel to make the website dynamic
deployed and maintained the website on digital ocean
lead a team of other volunteers and train them to learn about the technologies we use to manage the website

projects.title: blog with Django
projects.small_description: full featured blog with python and django3
description: this is a Full featured blog build with python and Django where People can read articles and comment on them or share the article with friends the blog is built with microservices

projects.title: E-learning Platform php
projects.small_description: this is an E-learning platform build with php/MVC providing free courses
description: an E-learning platform contains 3 user roles (student,instructor,admin)
Students can enroll in courses and watch lessons, solve assignments, take quizzes, download resources and watch their progress in all their courses, and can communicate with the instructor
instructors can CURD all their courses and lessons and quizzes
admins can add new instructors and delete instructors & courses & students

projects.title: E-commerce website with django
projects.small_description: A Clothes  E-commerce  with django using stripe for payment

projects.title: najlaa alsuwaidi web app
projects.small_description: this is personal website for najlaa alsuwaidi to display and create articles and books

projects.title: Advanced Todolist
projects.small_description: Web app to track your time and daily progress to increase productivity

projects.title: Beesarch
description: a freelancing platform for constructor workers
clients can create contracts and select between freelancers then transfer the money using PayPal
freelancers receive the money after each part of the project they finish
the system has competitions for all freelancers to participate in and the client can choose the best 5 designs and they receive prize
the system has support to fix conflicts

projects.title: Linkedin basic clone
description: this is a very basic clone of linkedin

projects.title: Tank war
projects.small_description: a 2D War Tank game with 3 different levels
description: a 2D game we made in java as a project in college where the player is tank and fights other tank to destroy all of them and move to the next level and there is bonus when destroying other tanks

projects.title: Compiler-for-NASM
projects.small_description: compiler build in python to run in linux machine
description: this is basic a compiler written in python to convert easy written human language to assembly that get executed by nasm assembler in (x86-64) Machine it contains variable declaration , loop , if and else condition and print statement

projects.title: Pyqt5 youtube downloader
projects.small_description: Desktop application to download from the internet or downloading youtube videos using python and pyqt5

projects.title: Arabic sign language Translator
projects.small_description: translating arabic text into signs using animations and the opposite

projects.title: Image captioning
projects.small_description: Using Flickr8k dataset since the size is 1GB. MS-COCO is 14GB! Used Keras with Tensorflow backend for the code. InceptionV3 is used for extracting the features.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
